title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 700.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations
(a) It is the
intent of the Commission of Investigation (the commission) to fully comply, to
the extent appropriate and required by law, with the provisions of article 6 of
the Public Officers Law (the Freedom of Information Law). To this end, commission personnel will furnish to the public the information and records
required by the Freedom of Information Law, as well as records otherwise
available, subject to the provisions of the laws applicable to the
commission. (b) These regulations
provide information concerning the procedures by which records may be
obtained. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
700.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
